description: aFRR energy activation probabilities for Expected Value (EV) weighting
data_source: TechArena2025 Phase 2 aFRR energy price data (2024 full year)

without_ev_weighting.behavior: Model assumes 100% activation of aFRR bids

with_ev_weighting.behavior: Model accounts for actual activation probability from historical data
with_ev_weighting.consequence: More realistic allocation between DA, FCR, aFRR-C, and aFRR-E
with_ev_weighting.objective: Realistic expected revenue based on market statistics

balanced_activation.description: Balanced aFRR-E activation scenario based on actual market statistics (2025-11-09)
balanced_activation.source: TSO data and market reports for DE, AT, CH, HU, CZ (2021-2024 aggregated)
balanced_activation.methodology: Represents actual pos/neg activation distribution when aFRR is called
balanced_activation.note: These values represent the split WHEN activated, not the probability of activation

DE.description: Germany - Slightly more negative activation (53% neg, 47% pos)

AT.description: Austria - Similar to Germany, aligned with APG-50Hertz cooperation

HU.description: Hungary - Slightly more negative activation (54% neg, 46% pos)

CZ.description: Czech Republic - Balanced with slight negative bias (52% neg, 48% pos)

default_values.description: Default balanced activation for countries without specific data

balanced_activation.implementation_note: Use these values for more realistic market modeling when EV weighting is enabled

historical_activation.description: EV weighting factors based on historical zero price percentages for aFRR-E
historical_activation.source: Calculated from 2024 aFRR-E price data (TechArena2025 Phase 2)
historical_activation.methodology: w = 1 - (zero_price_pct / 100) for pos and neg directions
historical_activation.purpose: Adjust aFRR energy bids to reflect actual activation likelihood
historical_activation.note: Lower w values indicate lower activation probability, leading to more conservative bidding

DE.description: Germany - High positive activation (94%), moderate negative (77%)

AT.description: Austria - High positive activation (91%), moderate negative (66%)

CH.description: Switzerland - Very high positive activation (99%), moderate negative (61%)

HU.description: Hungary - Low activation for both directions (41% pos, 19% neg)

CZ.description: Czech Republic - High activation (97% pos, 76% neg)

usage_notes: EV weighting is OPTIONAL - disable for conservative bidding (w=1.0)
Enable for more realistic profit estimation and market allocation

time_varying.description: Set to true when hourly/seasonal activation data becomes available
time_varying.future_enhancement: Time-of-day and seasonal variation in activation probabilities
